alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 8:34PM MDT until August 06 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Natrona County in central Wyoming... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 833 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Emigrant Gap, which is also 19 miles west of Casper, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Emigrant Gap around 850 PM MDT Casper between 850 and 910 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Red Butte, Homa Hills, Paradise Valley, Mills, Bar Nunn, and Evansville. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 209. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
